title: HOUR 1 - Vin Scully, Tom Brady, Broncos
itunes:title: HOUR 1 - Vin Scully, Tom Brady, Broncos
description:
Looking at the legendary life of Vin Scully

Tom Brady's career doesn't make sense

The Broncos will be fine even with the loss of WR Tim Patrick

 

Guest: Nick Wright
